title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
**Travel With Ease: 3-Pack Italy Power Adapter by VINTAR**

Are you planning a trip to Italy, Chile, or Uruguay? Don't let power adapter worries hold you back. Introducing the VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Travel Power Adapter, designed to keep you connected and powered on the go.

This 4-in-1 outlet adapter features two American outlets and two USB ports, allowing you to charge multiple devices simultaneously. With a maximum capacity of 2500 watts, you can safely power your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other essential electronics. The adapter's grounded 3-prong plug ensures your safety while in use.

The VINTAR Italy Power Adapter is ultra-light and compact, making it the perfect travel companion. Weighing in at just a few ounces, it won't take up valuable space in your luggage. Plus, its sleek design makes it easy to pack and transport.

**Key Features:**

* 4-in-1 outlet adapter with 2 American outlets and 2 USB ports (up to 2.4A)
* Compatible with Italy, Chile, Uruguay, and other countries (Type L)
* Safe and grounded 3-prong plug for secure charging
* Ultra-light and compact design for easy travel
* CE and FCC certified for quality assurance
* 12-month warranty and friendly customer service

**What's Included:**

* 3 x VINTAR Italy Power Adapters
* 12-month warranty
* Friendly customer service support

**Why Choose VINTAR?**

* High-quality products designed for safe and reliable use
* Ultra-light and compact design for easy travel
* Friendly customer service and 12-month warranty support

Don't let power adapter worries hold you back from enjoying your trip. Order the VINTAR 3-Pack Italy Power Adapter today and stay connected and powered on the go.
